Translations.Text: Apanara purbe'o ami pratyadesasaha manabake'i tadera prati prerana karechilama ata'eba jnaniderake jijnesa kara, yadi tomadera jana na thake

prerana karechilama taderake niê¦£2503;dasabali o abatirna granthasaha ebam apanara kache ami smaranika abatirna karechi, yate apani lokadera samane aisaba bisaya bibrta karena, ye gulo todera prati nayila kara hayeche, yate tara cinta-bhabana kare.
Yara kucakra kare, tara ki e bisaye bhaya kare na ye, allaha taderake bhugarbhe bilina kare dibena kimba tadera kache emana jayaga theke ayaba asabe ya tadera dharanatita.
Kimba calapherara madhye'i taderake pakara'o karabe, tara to ta byartha karate parabe na.
Kimba bhiti pradarsanera para taderake pakara'o karabena? Tomadera palanakarta to atyanta namra, dayalu.
Tara ki allahara srjita bastu dekhe na, yara chaya allahara prati binitabhabe sejadabanata theke dana o bama dike jhumke pare.
Allahake sejada kare ya kichu nabhomandale ache ebam ya kichu bhumandale ache ebam pheresatagana; tara ahankara kare na.
Tara tadera upara parakramasali tadera palanakartake bhaya kare ebam tara ya adesa paya, ta kare
allaha balalenah tomara du'i upasya grahana karo na upasya to matra ekajana'i. Ata'eba amake'i bhaya kara.
Ya kichu nabhomandala o bhumandale ache ta tamra'i ebadata kara sasbata kartabya. Tomara ki allaha byatita ka'uke bhaya karabe
tomadera kache ye samasta neyamata ache, ta allahara'i paksa theke. Atahpara tomara yakhana duhkhe-kaste patita ha'o takhana tamra'i nikata kannakati kara.
Erapara yakhana allaha tomadera kasta duribhuta kare dena, takhana'i tomadera ekadala sbiya palanakartara sathe ansidara sabyasta karate thake.
